title: Report should be "click to send" not "click or press enter to send"
body:
Title,
i feel like it needs to happen, usually you hit enter to go to the next line, but with the report system, in the middle of me typing i wanna go to another line, it just sends.                 {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I know the feel bro.  They fixed it for next patch though^^
